features: ❤EASY TO USE: No batteries need, just fill the bottle, pull trigger to spray mist, then mop the floor. Works well even when the pad is dry. Rotating head can easily reach any area. Easily cleans dust from under your sofa, table, bed or any other tight spot. Works well on any flooring.
❤NO WATERMARKS AFTER MOPPING: Spray mop head has excellent absorption capacity, leaving no streaks or puddles after use.
❤LIGHTWEIGHT AND CONVENIENT: Lightweight design with 50 inch long handle make mopping easier. So easy. No more need for heavy, messy buckets or cumbersome mops, a child can do it!
❤STURDY and DURABLE: Spray mop has a sturdy pole, with high quality design and structure. Mophead is made of impact-resistant plastic. Highly durable aluminum alloy pole for long-term use.
❤WARRANTY AND PACKAGE: 1 mop,1 refillable bottle(14 oz), 2 microfiber mop pads, and 1 scraper for heavy-duty scrubbing. If you have any questions, please contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 360° Swiveling Head The spray mop is designed with a 360 ° rotatable head, that can easily turn to fit any tight spot. No more achy muscles or back strain from stretching or twisting your body to reach difficult areas. Let the spray mop do the work for you! Easily Fits into Tight Spaces Our spray mop can reach all of the narrowest spaces without the need to lift your furniture ups. Easily cleans the dust under your sofa, tables, bed, or in corners. Maneuverable Trigger Simply pull the trigger with one hand, spraying mist evenly on your floor. The fine mist won’t pool on your floor and stain or damage it. The handle is ergonomically designed to provide you with the best comfort and relieve fatigue as you guide the spray mop effortlessly across your floors. Controlled Spectrum Spray Mist Press the trigger in short bursts, or longer ones, to control the pressure of the spraying action. Cleaning mist will cover a fan-shaped area from a distance of 5 to 40 inches.

Refillable Spray Bottle The 400ml spray bottle can be filled with the solution of your choice. Use store-bought or homemade cleaning solution to suit your own individual needs. Washable Microfiber Pads Made of dense microfiber, the mop pad can absorb and lock the smallest dirt. The microfiber pad is reusable and easy to clean, it can be machine-washable, it is wider cleaning pad can cut your floor cleaning time to make the mopping faster. Practical Scraper Comes with a scraper that can be used to scrape hair and dirt off from the microfiber pad, before washing. The flat edge can be used to scrape excess moisture from pad or tough dirt on floor. Convenient Velcro Design Convenient Velcro design makes attaching or removing the mop pads a breeze. The replacement pads are super thick and stay firmly attached even when soaking wet, or confronted with especially tough messes on floors that would require thorough scrubbing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cuts Mopping Time in Half
reviews.reviewText: This is a purchase I’d been meaning to make for a while—upgraded from a standard mop with disposable wet pads to this one that sprays and goes, and it’s washable!Pros:-you only need to use one pad & it has strong Velcro to keep the pad in place-completely saturates textured tiles whereas with my old mop I couldn’t get in the groves without pushing hard on the mop-effortless spray and push-ease to put together and maintain-swivels with ease and gets under furniture easily-Holds enough cleaner to cover my whole house (kitchen, laundry room, hallways, and 2 bathrooms)—I still has some leftover afterward, too-picks up typical floor stains with ease-leak-free-saves money on buying disposable pads; only have to buy bulk cleaner now-cuts mopping time in halfCons:-the handle/pole is sensitive to applied pressure, so definitely don’t feel like you need to put elbow grease into it—you don’t-cleaner container seems a bit flimsy but will see how it holds up with time-can’t set the cleaner container on the counter top to pour in the cleaner (a problem for those with coordination issues or another physical disability); I recommend the company change it from a rounded to a flat edge on bottom when it is flipped upside down to be filled-you need to remember to wash the pad if you’re a bit forgetful like I am, but I’ll just add it to my towel wash routine so I don’t forget-the blue mop is a tad on the short side, so if you’re taller than 5’5”, you’ll probably find it a bit uncomfortable; however, I noticed they also offer an extra long red mop-has a slight learning curve in terms of angling the sprayer (don’t spray it near your pet bowls or low lying plants)Overall, I had a pleasant experience using the blue mop for the first time. I’m partial to the ruffled, more traditional pad, but I have no doubt the other two microfiber pads work just as well. My last word of advice: if you struggle with executive functioning and/or arthritis, this is the mop for you. This was a great purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mop Marvel: This mop is a game-changer!
reviews.reviewText: The sturdy handle sets it apart, a rare find for this type of mop. The attached spray container is a brilliant touch – easy to remove, fill, and reattach. The spray covers a large area, optimizing cleaner usage. It's incredibly convenient, especially in a household with kids, making quick cleanups a breeze. A must-have for effortless and efficient mopping!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very light weight. The mop cushion works well and absorbs alot. Very easy to use. The handle is nice and comfortable. The quality is not as good as I have had and the tank is much smaller but I'm giving it a chance at this price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect mop for daily cleaning
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this mop! At first I was a bit skeptical because it seemed so flimsy out of the box but I have used this for a few months now and I am completely satisfied. I have laminate and vinyl in my house and cleaning it is now a breeze. The mop is lightweight and easy to use. The sprayer lays down just the right amount of cleaner (slight learning curve on directing the spray) and the best part is I control the type of cleaner that I use and the mop heads are machine or hand washable! No need to press down hard on this mop and I really wouldn't want to as the handle is a bit on the weak side but works perfect for me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for vinyl floors
reviews.reviewText: I recently had dark luxury vinyl floors installed and bought this to clean the floors. It is simple to use but so effective. The best part is that no bucket is needed. The detachable pads are easy to remove and wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: it really didn't get the job done. when I had a small apartment and the only mopping I did was in my tiny kitchen and bathroom, it was nice for a quick clean up daily. but didn't do a whole lot of actual cleaning. the rag wasn't that great. tried a bunch of different cleaners too to see if that changed things. it pretty much just wipes things down the same as a light wiping with a rag. the sprayer works well and I like that I could refill with my own solution. I never used a swiffer so I'm not sure how those compare. but I definitely prefer a good old mop and bucket.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy, effective spray mop
reviews.reviewText: I love the ease of swiveling the mop head wherever I want it. I love that there are no batteries. I love the mop heads, that with adding just a little pressure, can wipe off stains on the floor. I also love that the mop heads machine wash so easily and come out just about like new. There are two mop heads included, and I ordered three extra, thinking I would need them, but after some ordinary floor cleaning and a lot of cleaning up after my elderly dog with dementia, I am still on my first one that has had just one machine wash so far. I also love that it cost so mush less than the one advertised everywhere. I also love that I can use any cleaner that I want in the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A little fragile, but affordable and does the job well
reviews.reviewText: This works very well for cleaning and polishing hardwood and tile floors. This is my second time buying one, as I went a little too hard on the first one attempting to scrub stuck-on food in the kitchen floor. I highly recommend buying this to replace bulky mop and bucket, but if you have something stuck on your floor, I'd recommend using a wet cloth or a standard mop to clean it.
Muy buen producto ahorrador de tiempo los materiales no son los mejores pero es resistente te lo aseguro solo tengo dudas donde tengo que conseguir el repuesto con los que trapea de ahi todo perfecto
My son uses it and he is happy
Received yesterday and used today...I like the product but didn't get the extra microfiber pad...will use for few months and get back.

reviews.reviewTitle: Horrible and not sturdy at apl
reviews.reviewText: Horrible product.The mop broke off from the wiper in less than a month.Waste of money and time.Do not go for it
